Now: November 2022

Giving you an overview of what I'm up to at any time in my life, this page is part of Derek Sivers' Now movement. The strategy of this page was inspired by Derek Kedziora.
  • In Amsterdam simultaneously enjoying and dreading the cold
  • At Leeruniek thoroughly enjoying transitioning from product management back to design management.
  • Thinking of getting a corgi puppy
  • Working tirelessly to recover from an eating disorder
  • Invested in my yoga and meditation practice
  • Getting ready to buy a stage piano

  • Now: September 2021

Doing web things since 1997.

I'm Zinzy Waleson Geene (she/ they), a researcher, designer, queer facilitator, and IndieWeb advocate from Amsterdam. If you found anything on this website of value and want to say thank you, you can support me via Ko-Fi or PayPal.
